column2: "Task 6: <yellow>Hit an enemy with the Assault Rifle Weapon Action"

"・Use the Rifle Weapon Action
on enemies with <%PhotonArts>"

"・Use the Rifle Weapon Action
on enemies with <%MainPaletteC>"

"Phantom Rifle's Weapon Action fires \"Phantom Bits\", which can perform long-range shooting attacks.

You can also charge the Weapon Action to shoot a powerful piercing shot."
